```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

library(MonteCarlo)
library(tidyverse)


```


```{r}
poro <- rnorm(20, 0.2, 0.03)   ## fraction
area <- runif(20, 5, 12)       ## Km2
thk <-  runif(20, 8, 17)       ##  meters
sw <-   rnorm(20, 0.22, 0.07)  ## fraction
Bo <-   rnorm(20, 1.07, 0.02)  ## unitless


```

```{r}

vol <- function(area, height, poro, sw, bo) {   ## vol comes in bbls
  stoiip <- area * 1e6 * height * 6.28981 * poro * ( 1 - sw ) / bo 
}

```


```{r}


 param_list=list("area"=area, "height"=thk, "poro"= poro, "sw"= sw, "bo"= Bo )
```

```{r}

  MC_result<-MonteCarlo(func=vol, nrep=1000, param_list=param_list)
```
